ai-tha-ap60:1.4_0: I was struck with a banner’s crest.
ai-tha-ap60:3.1_0: Awakened as a fully awakened Buddha,
ai-tha-ap60:3.2_0: I pay homage to the supreme awakening.
ai-tha-ap60:4.1_0: The Teacher, standing in the Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap60:5.2_0: They don’t go to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap60:5.3_0: and the gods of the Thirty-Three,
ai-tha-ap60:6.2_0: Then the king will become kings,
ai-tha-ap60:6.4_0: thinking, “There will be a wheel-turning monarch.”
ai-tha-ap60:7.3_0: Gotama, the disciple of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap60:7.4_0: having no confidence in the teaching.
ai-tha-ap60:8.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap60:10.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap60:11.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bharadvāja.
ai-tha-ap60:12.1_0: a banner of the senior monks who had fallen into the eighth part of the senior monks.
